page.title: 07BOW CLUBS AND ORGANISATIONS
page.content: There are many clubs and organisations in the village. {THE MOTHERS UNION}is associated to the church and has 32 members,who actively support the life of the church within the village. {THE WOMENS INSTITUTE}is well supported and they meet in the Church Room every month.Their interest include,art,craft and conservation and have recently planted some trees on the verges of the main road.{BOW AND DISTRICT {GARDEN CLUB}have regular meetings and hold three flower and produce shows yearly.{THE TWINNING ASSOCIATION was formed to promote friendship with St Martin de Bienfaite,Calvados. {THE OVER 60's}Club meet weekly in the Community Room.{THE ROYAL BRITISH {LEGION}meet monthly at the Burston Inn.They have a parade for Remembrance Day and an annual Rally when they parade with their banners.
